001.title: 1A BEAT 2B ON PENALTIES
001.content: In a great turn of events, after conceding one goal at the start of the match. 1A managed to equalize, then maintain the result till the end of the match, going into penalties. At penalty shootout, Ali Kamel, 1A's goalkeeper, somehow saved the three penalties. Then, Karim Amr scored his penalty to qualify into quarter finals and eliminate the Giant, 2B.
